resources.string:
To play, both players enter their names and then click the Start Game button.

The game then begins a round. A round consists of each player consecutively selecting a bird they want to place. To select a bird, tap on the bird and it will be outlined. To confirm the selection press the Confirm Selection button and then pass the device to the other player.

Both players then consecutively try to place their birds without touching the other birds on the play area. To place a bird, drag on the screen to position the bird and then press the Place Bird button to finalize the position.

A new round then begins, but the order the players go in reverses. The game continues until one of the players overlap a bird with their placement. The player to overlap another bird first loses the game.
